subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Travis Kvapil won the first pole of his Sprint Cup career when he took the top qualifying spot at Talladega Superspeedway in Alabama. Kvapil turned a lap at 187.364 miles per hour in his Yates Racing Ford to win a pole in his 100th career start. Casey Mears qualified second in a Hendrick Motorsports Chevrolet. Dale Earnhardt Inc. placed all four of its cars in the top 10.
